The Desktop Heaters ensure durability an: Operating lifetime ≥ 2000 hours under continuous operation at 25°C ambient temperature
Withstands ≥ 10,000 on/off cycles (1 hour on, 0.5 hours off) with < 10% drop in max heating power
The Desktop Heaters feature cool-touch s: Maximum allowable surface temperature ≤ 60°C at 25°C ambient
Housing material flammability rating ≥ UL94 V-1
Toxic gas emission when overheated < 100 ppm Carbon monoxide
Impact resistance - survives 1 meter drop onto concrete with no damage
No accessible sharp edges with radius < 1 mm or pinch points
